Title: Damn the Torpedoes
Plot: A typhoon, a mutiny and a Washington coup d'etat will force Marcus and his crew into unlikely alliances. As Sam's grief strains his loyalty to Marcus, will Sainte Marina get the supplies it so desperately needs? How far will Marcus go to ensure the crew's survival -- will it cost him his life?
GuestStars: Jason Beghe, Chin Han, David Rees Snell, Will Rothhaar
